response.overview: Melanie is beset by misfortune after misfortune. In her weariness, Melanie continues to search for the meaning of destiny and the mystery of life.  However, all those who have promised her one by one have left and passed away, leaving Melanie alone. Could there be another way for Melanie...or should she give up, drift away and pass away?
response.title: Sutera di balik Purnama
